text: Sheldon is an unincorporated community in Houston County, in the U.S. state of Minnesota. ==History== A post office was established at Sheldon in 1856, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1903. The community was named for one of its founders, Julius C. Sheldon. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Houston County, Minnesota Category:Unincorporated communities in Minnesota
title: Sheldon, Minnesota
